message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This deal will only get worse for both of us as time goes on.
Alice, your cut is shrinking faster than mine. I'm offering a 55/45 split in your favor. Let's close this deal before it gets worse for you.
Bob, this is already getting ridiculous. I'll take a small hit and offer you 4400.  Take it before inflation eats away at your gains even more.
